- ORDER-104674 had no discount.
- ORDER-107495 had a 'BLACKFRIDAY50' discount, which was 50% off.
- ORDER-112543 had a 'GOODBUY20' discount, which was 20% off.

The 'SPRING10' discount (90%) is better than any of the previously used discounts. Therefore, there is no need to refund any previous order; you should use the 'SPRING10' discount for your MacBook purchase.
